meanings.sent1: The kindergarteners played together during recess.
meanings.sent2: The kindergarteners learned their ABCs in school.
meanings.sent3: The kindergarteners giggled when the teacher made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The kindergarteners were like little sponges, soaking up new knowledge every day.
meanings.sent5: The kindergarteners' laughter filled the classroom with joy.
